   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to CloudQuery's documentation!
======================================

**CloudQuery** is cloud dashboard for querying complex datasets. The project is 
implemented as a full-stack website with ``golang`` in the backend, ``vanilla javascript`` 
for frontend, and ``redis`` as the database. 

The project aims to help new-comers into the cloud-world with an ease startup 
full-stack website with full configurations and integration on ``aws`` using ``terraform``. 
Hence, new-learners can focus on integrating multiple technologies in a step-by-step manner as 
the base configurations is ready for modifications. 

The project is constructed under the following theme:

> `Write your database queries from the frontend, and the backend will take care of the rest.`

Now, get started with :doc:`guides/install` to fetch the required technologies on your machine,
and start your learning journey right-away. 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: User Guide:

   guides/install
